titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2625) to redesignate Washington National Airport as "Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport".

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-411, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2625 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Bill is open to amendments. After general debate, the time for consideration of the bill for amendment shall be limited to two hours. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 140.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 189 (Roll no. 3).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/3/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 2625 (Washington National Airport name change).
